installation\/index.md.Jeedom peut être installé sur différents: Jeedom can be installed on different hardware components
installation\/index.md.tout système Linux basé sur Debian 11 (B: any Linux system based on Debian 11 (Bullseye

installation\/index.md.En montage DIY (Do It Yourself), voici u: In DIY editing (Do It Yourself), here is a "typical" configuration to get started with Jeedom in Z-Wave

installation\/index.md.En principe, il vous faut une clef USB p: In principle, you need a USB key per additional protocol
installation\/index.md.En fonction de leur nombre et de leur co: Depending on their number and their cumulative consumption, on a Raspberry Pi you may need an additional USB hub with its dedicated power supply
installation\/index.md.Pour la clef Z-Wave Aeotec Gen 5 en util: For the Z-Wave Aeotec Gen 5 key in cumulative use with a Raspberry Pi 4 (previous models not affected), you must use a recent one if you want to do away with a USB hub
installation\/index.md.Se renseigner et se fournir chez un vend: Get information and get supplies from a home automation equipment seller
installation\/index.md.Sur RPi 4, il est vivement conseillé de: On RPi 4, it is strongly recommended to replace the microSD card with an mSATA USB3 hard disk, directly connected to the USB3 port with native boot
installation\/index.md.Les cartes microSD ont une durée de vie: MicroSD cards have a very limited lifespan due to intensive data exchange
installation\/index.md.à ne réserver que pour de courtes périod: only to be reserved for short periods of testing
installation\/index.md.et peuvent avoir besoin d'une connexion: and may need an internet connection
installation\/index.md.Jeedom est un logiciel qui est et rester: Jeedom is software that is and will remain open source, its use is completely free and does not depend on a cloud or a subscription
installation\/index.md.Cependant, certains plugins qui permette: However, some plugins that increase the capacity of Jeedom or its use may be chargeable
installation\/index.md.Vous pouvez retrouver la liste des plugi: You can find the list of plugins
installation\/index.md.Nous ne recommandons pas ce mode d'insta: We do not recommend this installation mode which makes the use of certain equipment complicated because of Docker's network mode
installation\/index.md.Une fois l'installation faite, n'oubliez: Once the installation is done, do not forget to consult the documentation
